definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Gold wall fabric inlays are on each side of the mantle over mahogany bookshelves.
sentences.chinese: 金牆壁織品鑲嵌細工在披風的每邊在桃花心木書架的。

sentences.english: We'll hike through mahogany forests and pay a visit to some Taiwanese macaques.
sentences.chinese: 一塊到臺南的桃花心木林爬山，和到烏山看獼猴。

sentences.english: For example, architecture of mahogany, it likes humid, worrying about drying.
sentences.chinese: 例如，桃花心木建築，它喜歡潮溼，對乾燥擔心。

sentences.english: All the materials he uses are brass, mahogany and galvanized iron.
sentences.chinese: 所有材料的用途，他是黃銅，桃花心木和鍍鋅鐵。

sentences.english: I'm going to use mahogany to make the book-case.
sentences.chinese: 我打算用桃花心木做書櫥。

sentences.english: Mahogany, the hardest wood in the world.
sentences.chinese: 桃花心木，世界上最硬的木頭。

sentences.english: Above the mahogany four-poster was a painting of a blond Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 桃花心木的四根帷柱的牀之上是一幅金髮耶穌的畫像。

sentences.english: The country's largest living mahogany tree also lives in the Everglades.
sentences.chinese: 還有國家最老的桃花心木葉生長在大沼澤地國家公園。

definition: pomelo tree (Citrus maxima or C. grandis)/shaddock/oriental grapefruit
